headline: MGM Resorts International (MGM) Sells MGM Northfield Park Operations to Private Equity Funds Managed by Clairvest Group
summary: Fisher Asset Management holds $4.10 million worth of MGM Resorts International (NYSE:MGM) shares, helping it secure a place on our list of billionaire Ken Fisher’s 10 consumer stock picks with the highest upside potential. On October 16, 2025, in a $546 million cash deal, MGM Resorts International (NYSE:MGM) announced the sale of the operations of […]
